Key Match Events: Ángel Di María scored the only goal of the match for Argentina in their 1-0 win against Ecuador.
Post-Match Reflections: Ángel Di María commented on the match, stating that it was a deserved win and praised Cristian Romero for his terrific pass.
Di María emphasized the importance of staying united and continuing to work hard as they prepare for the Copa America.
He acknowledged that Ecuador is a potential opponent in the Copa America and noted the significance of the match in demonstrating their current form.
